SummaryEnglish: The great music adventure in Show by Rock!! begins after Cyan decides to play her favorite rhythm game and suddenly gets sucked in, finding herself in a world called Midi City where music reigns supreme. She learns that anyone who delivers amazing and powerful music also has the ability to control the city. However, not all music is pure. An evil plan is set in motion to engulf the whole Midi City in darkness. Is it too late for Cyan to do something?
Aliases: ショウ・バイ・ロック!!しょ～と!!

0.SummaryEnglish: Happy-go-lucky short stories of daily lives of the band members of Plasmagica and ShinganCrimsonZ.

1.SummaryEnglish: This week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room features Plasmagica.

2.TitleEnglish: Fire away! Putting our crimson flame into a white ball... (etc.)
2.SummaryEnglish: SHINGANCRIMSONZ takes a trip to Midi Cians spa resort.

3.SummaryEnglish: Criticrista are guests on this week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

4.SummaryEnglish: A and Un's fateful meeting on Bamboo Island.

5.SummaryEnglish: Trichronika makes their third appearance on Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

6.SummaryEnglish: The origin of the band Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan is revealed!

7.SummaryEnglish: This week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room guests are SHINGANCRIMSONZ.

8.SummaryEnglish: Go behind the scenes with Criticrista to see how the Spa Resort Midicians commercial was made.

9.TitleEnglish: Shu☆zo's Dream Galaxy ☆ Absolutely ☆ DANCE STUDIO
9.SummaryEnglish: Trichronica gives a dance lesson on Shu☆zo's Dream Galaxy ☆ Absolutely ☆ DANCE STUDIO.

10.SummaryEnglish: Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan pay a visit in this week's Tokiko's R-R-R-Room.

11.TitleEnglish: St. Midi Girls' Academy Middle School's Special Lecture on Coyness
11.SummaryEnglish: The girls from Criticrista learn how to act coy during this special lecture.

12.SummaryEnglish: High school delinquents take the stage in this final episode before season two.

1.SummaryEnglish: Set in the glamorous metropolis Tokyo Midi City, where music—and the dream of musical superstardom—is everything. Here, “battle of the bands” is more than just a teen rivalry: Dozens of ensembles compete for the honor of playing atop the city’s highest tower. When a Gothic Lolita-clad catgirl cutie named Cyan stumbles into the music world, she too is swept up by the dream of fame.
Cyan Hijirikawa longs to join the band at school, but is too shy. While worrying about it at home, she's transported to another dimension…

2.SummaryEnglish: Cyan learns more about Sound World and meets SHINGANCRIMSONZ. She sees the power of music firsthand when she watches them play.

3.SummaryEnglish: Plasmagica gets entered into a battle of the bands against Criticrista, the hot new all-girl band in Midi City. Will they be able to win?!

4.TitleEnglish: Enchanting Dream Fireworks of a Night Journey
4.SummaryEnglish: Plasmagica goes to see the concert of a popular band called Tsurezurenaru Ayatsuri Mugenan and are taken in by their originality and stage presence.

5.SummaryEnglish: Cyan has to fight the dark monsters, but what will she do when she has to choose between performing with her band or protecting Sound World?

6.TitleEnglish: Ba-dump!? It's a Beach Training Camp Full of Swimsuits
6.SummaryEnglish: After everyone discovers the truth about Cyan, Maple proposes a training camp as they prepare new songs for the Grateful Rock Festival.

7.SummaryEnglish: Something strange is going on at Yokai Street, the hot new spot for street performances. Can Cyan and the others help solve the mystery?

8.SummaryEnglish: Plasmagica hasn't performed enough concerts to play in the Grateful Rock Festival, and Aion's gloominess is causing problems with his bandmates.

9.SummaryEnglish: It's time for Plasmagica's battle of the bands rematch with Criticrista. Will they be able to beat them with their new song?!

10.SummaryEnglish: As Plasmagica practices for the Grateful Rock Festival, Strawberry Heart warns the girls about Dagger's plans, but Chuchu's ambitions take a dark turn…

11.SummaryEnglish: The day of the Grateful Rock Festival has finally come, and as the bands get ready to perform, Cyan worries about the dark monsters…

12.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the final showdown against Dagger! Will Cyan and the others be able to defeat him once and for all?!

2.SummaryEnglish: Swept from the real world and back to Sound Planet, Cyan reunites with her bandmates to face the growing darkness. But with new bands and new songs, the pressure to be the best is at its highest! Can everyone band together to take on the Queen of Darkness and put a stop to her devastating plans?

1.SummaryEnglish: Cyan is back in her world when a new threat to Midi City appears, and she gets whisked back to Sound Planet.

2.SummaryEnglish: Cyan's back in Midi City, but duty calls Moa back to her home planet, and Plasmagica is in danger of being split apart again.

3.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the Sweet Sweets Girls Fes, and Plasmagica gets to participate for the first time. But how will their baking stack up to the competition?

4.TitleEnglish: Ba-dump!? It's a Floaty Water Sports Meet Full of Girls! ♡ Po-- (etc.)
4.SummaryEnglish: It's time for the Midicians all-girl water sports meet. Will Retoree be able to work together with Rosia for the most important event?

5.SummaryEnglish: The boys of SHINGANCRIMSONZ are up in a battle of the bands against newcomers ARCAREAFACT. Who will win?!

6.SummaryEnglish: Cyan needs to finish Plasmagica's new song in time for their next battle of the bands. Meanwhile, Yaiba digs up an old CD from Rom's past…

7.TitleEnglish: Song of the Lanterns on the 16th Night
7.SummaryEnglish: Cyan is undergoing special training with King to prepare her to write a new song. Meanwhile, SHINGANCRIMSONZ is also training for their rematch!

8.SummaryEnglish: SHINGANCRIMSONZ is about to have their rematch against ARCAREAFACT. Will they be able to win with their new song?!

9.SummaryEnglish: It's finally time for Plasmagica's battle of the bands against BVL, but will they be able to overcome Ailane's darkness?

10.SummaryEnglish: Victorious reveals her true form in the fight with Dagger and a shocking truth is revealed about BVL and Aion's past.

11.SummaryEnglish: Victorious's past is revealed, and Cyan and the others prepare for the Puru Land concert by writing a new song.

12.SummaryEnglish: It's time for that final battle with Victorious! Can Maple defeat her with his giant robot? Will the power of music prevail?
